options.content:
# Templar Version: v0.2.48

Last updated: 2025-03-20 00:29:00
Version data is periodically updated via the version API

targets.query:
from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active_peers" or r._field == "gather_peers")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] == "${uid}" or "${uid}" == "$__all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "miner")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${version}" or "${version}" == "$__all")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "tplr")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "training_step" or r._measurement == "validator_window")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "gather_success_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["uid"] == "${uid}" or "${uid}" == "$__all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "${role}" or "${role}" == "$__all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["group"] == "${group}" or "${group}" == "$__all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["version"] == "${version}" or "${version}" == "$__all")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 100.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
